39 class ConsoleReader : public QObject
40 {
41  Q_OBJECT
42 public:
43  explicit ConsoleReader(QObject *parent = 0) :
44  QObject(parent),
45  notifier(STDIN_FILENO, QSocketNotifier::Read)
46  {
47  connect(&notifier, SIGNAL(activated(int)), this, SLOT(text()));
48  }
49 
50 signals:
51  void textReceived(QString message);
52 
53 public slots:
54  void text()
55  {
56  QTextStream qin(stdin);
57  QString line = qin.readLine();
58  emit textReceived(line);
59  }
60  private:
61  QSocketNotifier notifier;
62 };
